## ğŸš€ Quick Start Commands

```bash
# Start development server (opens browser automatically)
npm run dev

# Build for production
npm run build

# Preview production build
npm run preview

# Type check
npm run type-check

# Lint code
npm run lint
```

## ğŸ¨ Customization Steps

### 1. Update Your Information (5 mins)
- [ ] Edit `src/pages/Home.tsx` - Replace hero content
- [ ] Edit `src/pages/About.tsx` - Update bio and timeline
- [ ] Edit `src/pages/Services.tsx` - Add your service packages
- [ ] Edit `src/pages/Testimonials.tsx` - Replace with real testimonials
- [ ] Edit `src/pages/Contact.tsx` - Update email and social links

### 2. Customize Colors (2 mins)
- [ ] Edit `tailwind.config.ts`
- [ ] Update primary, secondary, and accent colors
- [ ] Rebuild with `npm run build`

### 3. Add Your Branding (5 mins)
- [ ] Update logo in `src/components/Navbar.tsx`
- [ ] Update footer branding in `src/components/Footer.tsx`
- [ ] Add professional photos/images

### 4. Deploy (Choose one method)
- [ ] **Vercel** (5 mins) - Easiest, recommended
- [ ] **Netlify** (5 mins) - Also very easy
- [ ] **GitHub Pages** (3 mins) - Free
- [ ] See `DEPLOYMENT.md` for detailed instructions

## ğŸ”§ Technology Stack

| Layer | Technology |
|-------|------------|
| **Framework** | React 19 |
| **Language** | TypeScript |
| **Build** | Vite 7 |
| **Styling** | Tailwind CSS 3 |
| **Routing** | React Router v6 |
| **Forms** | React Hook Form |
| **Validation** | Zod |
| **HTTP** | Axios |
| **Package Manager** | npm |

## ğŸŒ Deployment Options
